评论详情: I’m a tall girl with broad shoulders and this looked terrible on me. But it comfy material nice and flowy. Just be prepared, this was a learning experience for me. Strapless is not for me, know what suits your own body.

The dress I ordered clearly said “yellow floral” but there is absolutely NOTHING about it that is yellow. Bummer for me - as I wanted yellow. However, it does fit well and is nice. Kinda heavy (I try to pack light), but I will keep it in spite of it being PINK and NOT YELLOW as given.

I loved the colors but not the fit. The tube top style did not look good on me. Might be better on smaller cheasted women. The rest of the dress is nice and flowy and will look good on anyone. Lightweight fabric, great for the summer heat.
Very cute!! Fits great.
Not cotton but nice material, very light but not see-through. Fit a little bigger than I'd like but I'll tighten those seams. Overall, not bad for the price. Love the fabric design
My daughter in law loves this dress for a summer addition. Color and fabric are just right, and it laundered well,

Because I'm short, the dress is a little long. But I only bought it to wear at home. I've washed it numerous times and have not had any issues with it. I wear it for everything. Working in the yard or garden, mowing the lawn and using the extra deep pockets for carrying my hand prunes, gloves and misc. Haven't had a problem with a single seam or stitch. Would definitely buy again.

评论概述: Should be advertised as a maternity dress
评论详情: This should’ve been advertised as a maternity dress. Top fits correctly and the length is fine but the stomach part is huge. If you are pregnant then this dress is great for you! I’m not, so I had to return. I did like the material though.
The dress is adorable. lightweight material, flowy. Size down if you want a more "cling" look. Perfect for summer in Florida and it has pockets!

I bought this exact dress, same size and color. I loved it. APRICOT was kinda peachy color and pretty. This time it came in a tan color or light beige. Returning. I would have ordered another color AND kept this one too but I believe I'll try another brand.
I like the look of the dress, very comfortable, love that it has pockets the material is like a jersey cloth,  can’t beat the price!  Got a L & I’m 5’7, 190

This looked so cute in the pictures so I ordered it thinking that it would be nice to wear for my swearing in ceremony. Unfortunately the pictures make it look much nicer than it is. Firstly it came all crumpled up in a bag full of creases and then trying it on the shape and hang of it is just all wrong. I ordered my usual size (small) but it's too big and shape just isn't it. Maybe with some altering it will be better...

评论概述: I feel pretty in this dress! The color ombres are wonderful!

评论详情: I bought this dress for a wedding and it exceeded all expectations! The quality is fantastic, the colors are absolutely stunning, and the fit is perfect. This product is an absolute 10 out of 10! I received numerous compliments on this beautiful dress. I highly recommend it!

Very pleased. The material is heavy enough not to cling but it's not hot. it's also not at all see-through. The top fits me a bit loose, I'm a B cup, and would probably fit a C cup better but it fits well enough that it still looks good. Love the pockets!!! They lay flat and are a cute detail. I'm 5'6" and the hem falls mid calf. I am long waisted and have a problem with most dresses that have an elastic waist because most of them hit me at mid rib cage. This waist falls just above my natural waist so it would probably be perfect on someone of average proportions.
True to size, great summer dress!

评论概述: Really Loved this Comfy and Cute Dress
评论详情: I really like this dress.  Its comfy and breathable, but still cute. I wore it for Mother's Day Brunch and was very comfortable sitting outside for most of the day.  Its not sheer and its a good length that I wasn't constantly worried about flashing the family.  Lovely and comfy dress.

This is a basic maxi dress, especially in solid black,  which is what I ordered. I like the style and fit. Sizing on point. My issue is that the materialis very see through. I had to order a slip to wear underneath it.
I love the color and the print around the bottom is beautiful. The dress is comfy and the material is soft. This is a great dress for summer.

This is SO beautiful. I love everything about it. Beautifully designed; gusset seams at the bust; nice quality fabric and lining; generous pockets that fit seamless with the shape and line of the dress. The colors and pattern are lovely, and the fit is great. My new favorite dress <3
This is a nice dress. It’s comfortable, feels like linen, but it is thin. I do suggest wearing a slip with this dress.
This dress looked nothing like this on me .

My first impression is that this dress is VERY thin and almost transparent (you can see in the full length pic at the bottom) ...I will have to be very cautious about what type of undergarments to wear underneath, since I don't currently own a slip. Thankfully I ordered the black, so I can work around it. The fit was pretty good...I'm 5-7, 215 pounds, and the XL fit pretty comfortably. The best part of course, is that it has pockets. So I would have rated it 3 stars for the transparency issue, but you can always get an extra star for reasonable-sized pockets!

This dress will be ok for summer.  It is light weight.  The style is casual however, I don't like the elastic across the back.  I would have preferred none but I missed that when researching this item.  I ordered black in my normal size medium.
I love this dress! It’s so comfortable and flattering and true-to-size! I’ve only worn it once and I have received so many compliments!

This dress is really pretty - will be great for the summer.  I love the length of the dress.  The girls in my family have a hard time finding dresses that are long enough without being a maxi dress.  We're all tall (2 of us are 5'9" and one is 6').  We will actually be able to share this dress this summer.It seems to be well made.  I like how the dress flows at the bottom.  It's a nice modest dress.

评论概述: Don't like how the back is constructed
评论详情: I am giving this summer dress from SAUKOLE a 3-star rating because of the fit and the back construction of this dress.  On some people this dress will be excellent and look super cute.  On me it is just okay.What I like:  The flattering square neckline.  The lightness of the material.  The pockets.  How easy 100% polyester is to care for.  The double layer of the front bodice with the gather skirt attached.What I don’t like:  The arm openings are much too large on me – gapping open.  The back of the dress.  Instead of having a top back piece similar to the front with the gathered skirt attached, they have used one solid piece of fabric and attached the thin piece of elastic at the waistline.  It looks cheap and makes the dress fit poorly.  The dress is heavier in the front, so the back rides up and pulls forward over the shoulders.This dress will be very cute on some, but only okay on me.  It is a nice light weight perfect for the hot days of summer with a flattering neckline and pockets.  I don’t like the cut/construction of the back and the armholes gap on me.

This is an adorable dress and it is very comfortable. It falls nicely on my curves without making me look chunky or boxy. The material is thinner so it is great for summer or with layers for winter. I’m really looking forward to continual use of this dress.
This is very well made and the material is high quality. It fit perfectly and the style and pattern is awesome

I love how soft the fabric is and that the bodice is lined. The skirt has an attractive flair without an abundance of fabric. Wash and wear for easy care. I’m going to pair this with a three quarter sleeve jacket or sweater.
This dress is very pretty but shows your bra.

Noticed the description states Ruffles... no ruffles on my dress. I love the way the bodice fits, perfectly. Nice wide straps and nicely squared off neckline  The material felt heavier than I had expected, but I love the way it "hangs" on my. Being short, it reaches about my ankles. There are deep side pockets which is an added bonus.  Ordered this beautiful long Boho dress for a cruise and I have the perfect shoes to go with it.  This is a dress I would get multiple colors in, just so comfortable and stylish.
This is a cute and lightweight spring and summer dress. It fits modestly. If you have any extra weight in the middle, it can make you look bigger. The pockets are nice.

The Women's Summer Square Neck Sleeveless Dress is a delightful addition to summer wardrobes. The square neck and sleeveless design offer a breezy and stylish look perfect for warm weather. The A-line silhouette with solid ruffle detailing adds a touch of femininity, and the dress is versatile enough for beach outings or boho-inspired occasions. Its long length makes it an elegant choice for various summer events. Overall, a chic and comfortable dress that effortlessly combines casual and bohemian aesthetics for a fashionable summer statement.

评论概述: Love this dress for beach photos
评论详情: We were able to beat the dark so picture is a little hard to see but I love this dress. It’s very flowy and I love this color. Size runs true

评论概述: Well fitting, flowy dress - can't wait to wear it in the summer!
评论详情: I typically wear a size medium or 8/10 pants, and I'm 5'7" and about 145 pounds. I ordered the size medium for this sundress and am really pleased with how it fits.  It is nice lightweight fabric that will be great for summer time. It's fitted on the top and flowy on the bottom, and I feel like it hides my mid-section well (which is where I tend to carry any extra weight). It has nice big pockets, and who doesn't love a dress with pockets?!  I am very pleased with the neckline - it is more modest than I was anticipating and doesn't have much of a gap when I lean forward. It is a little longer than I anticipated, and goes down to about mid-calf on me.  Hope you enjoy my nice socks in the photo - can't wait for the weather to warm up again so I can kick those off and enjoy this beautiful dress in the warm outdoors!

This woman’s sundress is really nice. The material and stitching. Is done very well. No loose strings or stitching’s anywhere. This is very loose and slowly and if you’re short, you may have an issue I’m 5 foot tall and it goes completely down to my ankles. It’s soft and fits a little big. I normally wear a medium so I ordered a medium and I think I could probably wear a small.
Lovely dress. It is comfortable. The pockets are a plus. The top half is a bit fitted and the bottom half flows. I really like the pattern. I am wearing a M.
so vibrant and great pick ... i just in love with this dress.

This dress is really stunning! I can’t wait until summer rolls back around so I can wear this. My only complaint is how long it is….I’m 5’3 and it drags the ground without heels on so get you some nice high heels for this one! Other than that it’s gorgeous buy it right now!
Lots compliments 😍😍

I was scared when I received this as it was super rinkly as to how it would turn out cause the ruffles looked a little crazy at first. it was so comfy and such an easy dress to wear for maternity pictures! I even got it dirty in the lake and there is no staining I can’t wait to try it now not being pregnant!  (It is a little see through when the light hits just right so you can see the slip pretty easily but what do you expect when you order a white dress, it’s gonna be see through)
So cute and flowy! A little bit sheer but so good for summer
Fits nice, quality material and lined!
Runs small and not really flattering if you have any size bust

评论概述: MUST HAVE CONFIDENCE AND/OR A PARTICULAR BODY TYPE
评论详情: I'm a versatile person. I pride myself on being able to make whatever/wherever/whenever...work. But this dress has humbled me enough to admit defeat. I'm 5'9. 32DDD. Hourglass shaped and yet, I managed to look like the frumpiest little tissue paper that has ever existed lol. Honestly. I think if I were petite all around, chest/butt/etc...it would be perfect. But any sort of boobs is just going to sadly, throw it off and SOMEHOW even make you appear a bit masculine? Idk. No thank you amazon. It was a good try though, super cute colors.

This dress surprised me! Not a color pallet I would typically chose but it worked for the occasion. There is a partial list jng and the rest is very light and flowy. Perfect for a hot summer day! Got lots of compliments. Only downfall is that the top is a bit see-through and I had to wear pasties. So I would suggest a strapless bra

I have had this on my wish list for ages so when the price dropped I went for it. The second it arrived I tried it on, took this picture- then ordered it in two more colors! I love it! It’s flowy and dreamy and super comfortable. It’s a bit transparent, even with the built in half slip, but nothing a bra and biker shorts underneath didn’t fix.
This dress is adorable!  I love it so much I ordered it in 3 colors! ❤️❤️ It comes a wrinkled mess so knowing how to iron is a must!
It was a beautiful dress but the size was way to small. It was for a girl wearing a size 9 to 10

评论概述: TTS but neckline is a little strange
评论详情: This is a cute dress with great colors, however the neckline threw me off. I think I would like the dress better if it didn't have straps.
Very comfortable and so pretty. Many compliments. Also pretty comfortable to wear in the jungle of Hawaii!
Nah, don't buy this. It's not cute at all.

评论概述: A tad long, but otherwise great!
评论详情: I’ve had my eye on this for over a year, so when I saw the price drop, I had to snag it. I absolutely love it. The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is the length. At 5’3”, this still trails along the ground even after putting on wedges. Regardless, I’m looking forward to wearing it on our beach vacation coming up!

Much better as pictured which is where this garment should stay!  I ordered a small and received an XL?!  The top looked too big and the tie did not really serve a functional purpose.  Tying the tie would make the garment even more unflattering.  Great color.
Small top and extra long length

评论概述: Not as shown in picture and cheap dress
评论详情: This dress was a disappointment. I unfortunately had to return it. Its not flattering and the ruffles at the top are not as the picture shows they are worse. The material is cheap.
Very good quality. Runs bigger than the size. Love the color.
I ordered for my girlfriend ant it looked amazing on her! Size was right
The dress fits well but every inch of it is a wrinkled MESS!! It needed to be packed in a small box not a plastic bag!! 😞😞
I just couldn't get past the fabric.

While the light blue dress I bought was a pretty color it did not flatter my curvy figure.The thing I disliked the most was that there is a slip attached to the underneath of this dress but it was not long enough and did not cover my whole but and you could see through it and it looked bad.

I was so excited when this got delivered but unfortunately I had to return it because it was too long in the back.  It fit perfectly everywhere else except the length.  Not made for a 5’3 person but if you are over 5’4, definitely order this true to size, flattering summer dress
-ordered the lilac , the color and style look just like the photo -fits really nice on top and nice and flowy at the bottom -will order again in another color
Excellent fabric of substance ,beautiful color very flattering on my short and plump figure ...I'm impressed. ...

评论概述: Beautiful Lavender Color and Flattering Fit!
评论详情: Love the color and nice fabric. Not cheap like so much of what I order now. Look forward to wearing it on my cruise in a couple of months.
Got this for a wedding guest dress. You can tell it’s not the highest quality but the wrinkles came out perfectly and it’s a cute dress for the price. Very comfortable to wear with or without a bra.

I saw a pretty popular Instagram influencer wear this and it looked amazing in here photos. In person it’s super cheap material and looked like a bad costume. I would never wear it out on public. It was not breathable at all either. This was a quick return.

I actually loved how this dress looked HOWEVER the skirt under the dress (that helps the dress not be see-through) was sewn up to the waist on one side. There was no way to fix this without the dress ripping from pulling on the thread. AND I ordered apricot and received pink! I need this dress for a trip but having to return this and reorder is really inconvenient :/

The material is very weird! The fit on the dress is so small and not as flowing as the pictures show. Also be advised you can’t return this product! Thankfully the company gave me a full refund as I couldn’t ship it back to them. They told me to give the dress to someone else but no one wants this this. The material feels like paper but it’s got this noisy plastic quality. Most bizarre thing ever. Buyer beware.
Very cute, fits well  color as expected
The dress is so beautiful and it fits perfectly

This was purchased for my maternity shoot at 36 weeks pregnant. I had to steam it before wearing which wasn’t a big deal. I think it was flattering and the photos turned out lovely. Reasonable price too!
I was so disgusted when I opened this pkg. Horrible.

评论概述: Horrible fit- horribly made. Came already stained in makeup.
评论详情: The material on this dress is very heavy. All the material gathers at the waist making the dress look very frumpy- and it is unfixable. Clearly this is a frequently returned product considering mine was delivered to me with the inside caked in foundation or self tan. It DOES NOT look like the picture. Do not buy.

I purchased this from an influencer who had suggested it. I wish I didn't. The color and fit is as expected but it is soooo see through. You would have to purchase a separate strapless slip to be able to wear this dress.
Order the dress! Received so many compliments! Very comfortable.
Love this dress! Very flattering, fits nicely while i'm pregnant but also will be great for later on. Nicely made, not sheer at all.

It is gooood! It's so flowy and Because I am 5'3" it looks longer on me. It's just so beautiful! For the price that I got (less than $45) it is great! This is one of those Instagram worthy dress! I am ready for beach vacay!

So hard to get wrinkles out of this fabric. The top ruffle doesn’t lay down in a flattering way and looks cheap. I didn’t wear it a single time because it looks so bad, even after washing and ironing.
The breast area had extra lining that made it difficult to wear. The liner pops out no matter what I did. The length is fine, the material is also fine. I wanted to wear it but couldn’t.
Cheap fabric item is see through
This dress is stretchy without looking like it has no shape. Soft material and ready for the beach, dinner or wherever you go.

The dress shipping was very timely, although it arrived wrinkled as the other reviews mention. Not unmanageable, would just take some time. Overall, it's quality, cute, and I didn't notice it being see-through. I ended up returning the dress though because, as a short girl (5'1" 120lbs), this dress was not flattering on me. It's meant to be long, and fell nicely to just above my ankles, but that style swallows up my features and makes my body look like a weird, chunky stick. I also don't have very large boobs (B cup) and due to the stretchiness of the bodice section I needed my C-cup strapless bra to have a good form in the dress. I would've gotten it hemmed, but the band of cut-out design is part of the point of purchasing the dress so I decided against it.
Beautiful fit and color. Fit is true yo size. I usually wear a 2-4 and small was perfect. Love the liner (satin type fabric) and the outer chiffon glows beautifully. Highly recommend.
I used it for my maternity photos. It got perfect and it was very comfortable. Definitely recommend.
The bottom is sheer and the under layer is only knee length
Found this product suggestion on Tik Tok and it’s a total steal!! Absolutely love the dress, very flattering, true to fit. The fabric is not see-through either. 10/10! Larger chest friendly.
Loved the dress but it had a 4” hole at the seam. Bummed to have to return. It’s definitely not high quality but still cute for the price. I recommend you inspect closely.

I love the dress itself. Very cute. Decent quality. Im 5’4 220 pounds 8 months pregnant. Busty as well and it fits good. BUT I ordered APRICOT! This dress is for my baby shower saturday came on Thursday night and it came in PINK. Im so pissed seeing as how I can’t even return it and get the right color back on time. So now I have to wear a pink dress when I had my heart set on the apricot color. I hope next time they pay better attention when shipping to someone else. The lighting isn’t good but trust me is it’s pink and not apricot.

This outfit is absolutely adorable. I really wish it had straps on it so it would stay up. The cups are incredibly stretchy and accommodating for girls of a small bus to a large bust size. Do not size up if you’re worried that the cup size might not fit your girls. It will. Go with the size do you normally would wear.

I’ll be completely honest; I didn’t even try this dress on. I took it out of the package and held it up to my body, and it is inches above my ankles. I bought a large assuming it would have more length than my usual medium but it absolutely did not. The top of the dress is stretchy but too large for my 32” bust.  If you’re a tall queen, skip it.  Also, the quality of fabric is much thinner than I was expecting. Other than that, the dress is super cute.
My daughter had some beach pictures done in this dress. It's light and was very cute on not see through.
7 months pregnant and this dress stretched and hugged perfectly. I’m also 4’11 and the length was perfect.
Fits well. Doesn’t drag below my feet which sometimes happens when I order maxi’s as a relatively short girl. The top is tight fitting and then flared out at the waistline so it’s very flattering
I ordered this for mommy & me photos and I had selected the apricot color but they sent me pink. It still worked out, photos came out super cute! It was very comfy.

This dress would have been absolutely adorable — if the top 3 inches of the ribbed elastic section hadn’t been completely stretched out to where it just gaped around the entire torso. I believe I was sent a previously returned order, but I’m not sure. The length was perfect, material was soft, the stylistic keyhole with flowy fabric detail was cute, but it just didn’t work out for me with this particular piece they sent.
Such a cute feminine dress! Lots of compliments.
I wasn’t a fan ,the top just lays weird . It absolutely was the correct fit , it just didn’t look right. Maybe it would have looked better with bigger boobs
